sentence: Democrats, meanwhile, already have a presumptive nominee in Attorney General Josh Shapiro, who has crossover appeal and a national reputation built in part by pushing back against Trump’s election lies.
title: Inside the chaotic GOP primary for governor in Pennsylvania

sentence: “This is about partnering with other Republicans to make sure we have a process that doesn’t get hijacked by the media or liberal activists.” Murtaugh said, “the media doesn’t have an interest in picking the best Republican candidate to beat Josh Shapiro.

title: 4 GOP candidates for Pa. governor set rules to join a debate

sentence: Attorney General Josh Shapiro, after all, will come through the primary season without a scratch.
title: Editorial: GOP candidates should embrace better debates
